state: {
	title: '' // 5 char string
	words: [], // Array of 25 words
	score: 0, // Integer (decimal) of bitfield (binary) representing covered squares (see below)
	fetchingWords: false,
	
}

http://www.catonmat.net/blog/low-level-bit-hacks-you-absolutely-must-know/
(dec >>> 0).toString(2);
